import React, { useState} from "react" import './Login.css' function Login({setToken}) { const [username, setUsername] = useState() const [email, setEmail] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() function handleUsername (e) { e.preventDefault() setUsername(e.target.value) } function handleEmail (e) { e.preventDefault() setEmail(e.target.value) } function handlePassword (e) { e.preventDefault() setPassword(e.target.value) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const token = { username, email, password } setToken(token) } return(
